quotes.quote: You can manifest the life you truly want with clear intention, emotional intelligence and imagination like it or not, your life is what you have chosen.
You will manifest your sacred character when you connect to the Creator.
Whatever you are inside, the good and bad will manifest in the outside world. It will come out in some way. It will come out in your work. It will come out in words. It will come out.
Dreams. They start in your beautiful mind. Think of beautiful things and it will manifest into actions because your body will listen to you. Like it always does.
Manifest the divinity within you and everything will be harmoniously arranged around it.
You must have a vision before you can manifest anything.
The person of old had the same brilliance of mind that we assume we have now. But that which made a thing become manifest for the first time is our great moment of creative happening.
Never let life impede on your ability to manifest your dreams. Dig deeper into your dreams and deeper into yourself and believe that anything is possible, and make it happen.
Within you is the divine capacity to manifest and attract all you desire.
What you pray for today, will be manifest tomorrow.
The true measure of success is how many times you can bounce back from failure.
Everyone sees the unseen in proportion to the clarity of his heart, and that depends upon how much he has polished it. Whoever has polished it more sees more unseen forms become manifest to him.
Our purpose here on earth: to manifest the very nature of our spirit, which is touched by the spirit of God.
To manifest your hearts desires you must be what your heart desires.
All mankind's inner feelings eventually manifest themselves as an outer reality.
A flow of happiness and abundance will manifest when you have reached the deepest level of yourself.
We manifest character when self-sacrifice for the sake of our principles becomes more important than compromise for the sake of popularity.
Each of us can manifest the properties of a field of consciousness that transcends space, time, and linear causality.

We like things to manifest right away, and they may not. Many times, we're just planting a seed and we don't know exactly how it is going to come to fruition. It's hard for us to realize that what we see in front of us might not be the end of the story.
Be mindful of your thoughts and words for they are the pen writing that which will manifest.
Fully inhale your dream and completely exhale manifestation of it.
Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
